author: blade
title: ADA Handle Wallet Authentication
description: NFT sales get overwhelmed by bots and contribute immensely to chain congestion. Since our system mints perpetually, we need a solution.
solution: Integrate dApp-ready wallets to our Minting Portal. This will allow us to verify users who are staked to a pool while also removing email.
experience: Our team has nearly 40 years of combined software experience ranging from small side-projects to Fortune 500 companies, including Facebook.
